public abstract class Expr
extends ParseNode
Those ParseNodes that--after expansion--define the kernel expressions evaluated by the EZ Virtual Machine.

eval(Scope)
Used to evaluate this expression to a value.
printAsBlockOn(IndentWriter)
testBind(ScopeEditor)
Used to evaluate this expression for flow of control.

eval 
 public abstract Object eval(Scope pov) throws Exception, Ejection
Used to evaluate this expression to a value.

testBind 
 public ScopeEditor testBind(ScopeEditor pov) throws Exception, Ejection
Used to evaluate this expression for flow of control. If this expression evaluates to true, testBind() returns a Scope in which "then" code should be executed. If this expression evaluates to false, testBind() returns null.

The default behavior of testBind() is to call eval() and return pov or null accordingly.

Returns:
nullOk;
printAsBlockOn 
 public void printAsBlockOn(IndentWriter os) throws IOException
